definition: Alcántara, municipality in the province of Cáceres, Extremadura, Spain/Alcantara, Brazil space launch site
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
pit/threshold/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing water/☵
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
